# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(text)
    lines = []
    
    for word in words
        if length(join(lines)) + length(word) <= text_width
            push!(lines, word)
        else
            push!(lines, "\n$word")
        end
    end
    
    return join(lines)
end

example = wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")
println(example)
```

The output of the `example` would be:

```
This function will 
wrap words into lines
```
